snippet.title: Soulstice - Battle with Sir Donovan Gameplay
snippet.description:
Soulstice is coming to PC, PlayStation® 5, and Xbox Series X|S on September 20!
https://soulsticegame.com/

Donovan, the Shadeless, is considered one of the strongest Chimeras alive. Using only his skill and strength, Donovan can slice his opponents clean in half with a single swing. Observing such a legend battling up close is a lucky sight...unless you're on the wrong end of the blade.

Explore a dark world brimming with hidden mysteries, master a diverse combat system, and inhabit the dual forces of two sisters in a coming-of-age dark fantasy story with fast-paced action, vicious enemies, and spectacular boss fights.

Players eager to get a taste of Briar’s blitzing weapons-based combat and her sister Lute’s otherworldly arena-commanding abilities can pre-order the Deluxe Edition from https://store.maximumgames.com/products/soulstice-deluxe-edition

Follow Us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/modus_games
Watch us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@modusgames
Like Us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ModusGames/
Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/modus
